text: You Can't Run Away from It is a 1956 American musical comedy movie directed by Dick Powell and starring June Allyson, Jack Lemmon, Charles Bickford, Jim Backus, Allyn Joslyn, Henry Youngman, The Four Aces. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1956 comedy movies Category:1950s American musical movies Category:American comedy movies
title: You Can't Run Away from It
